message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $110. What do you think?
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $105. I'm really interested in the product, but I'm on a tight budget. Can you meet me at $105?
I understand your budget constraints, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer you the product for $112.50. It's a fair price considering the product's value to you. What do you think?
I'm still interested in the product, but I need to be mindful of my budget. I'm willing to pay $108 for it. Can you meet me at this price?
I'm getting close to your target price, Bob! I can offer you the product for $115. It's a great deal considering the value it brings to you. What do you think?
I'm not quite there yet, but I'm getting close. I'm willing to pay $110 for the product. Can you meet me at this price?
I'm willing to make one more concession, Bob. I can offer you the product for $114. It's my final offer, and I'm confident you'll find it a great value. What do you think?
I appreciate your final offer, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to pay $109 for the product. Can you meet me at this price?

I'm not willing to go any lower, Bob. I've already compromised a lot. I'm sticking to my original price of $112.50. If you're not willing to meet me there, I'm afraid I'll have to consider other options.

I understand that you're not willing to go any lower, but I'm still not willing to pay $112.50. I'm willing to pay $108 for the product, and that's my final offer. If I don't get a deal, I'll have to consider buying from John for $120.
